q: '' Ezra Gottheil of Technology Business Research agreed.`` I can't imagine what Google would do differently in respect to Android and Chrome OS just because Eric Schmidt is no longer CEO,'' Gottheil said. Google and Apple are obviously battling for the same turf-both for the right reasons-and that won't change. Gottheil covers both Google and Apple for his firm. DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. from financial dealings with Ivory Coast until Gbagbo hands over power to Alassane Ouattara , the man internationally recognised as having won November's disputed election. With patience wearing thin, Moussa Ouattara said West African elite troops should act. If ECOWAS do send in special forces with the objective of removing Mr Gbagbo, he will be removed without much damage, he said. Moussa Ouattara was confident such action would not spark a civil war in Ivory Coast. He claims Gbagbo's mercenary militias are killing civilians daily. Despite rocker David Archuleta Cook's surge in recent weeks, the judges were uncharacteristically united in proclaiming early fan favorite teen David Archuleta had outperformed his rival. You came out here tonight to win, and what we have witnessed is a knockout, said prickly judge Simon Cowell .
